markdownRemark.html:
Motivation

As a student, self-financing person I have a lot of places where I spending money, I did want some easy way to control better my expenses.

First Thoughts

First of all, as a programmer my first idea was to create an easy app just for writing down and saving expenses. Problem was, I don’t know how to create android/iOS applications and in past I had only experience with creating web applications. Loading web page and interacting with the web app inside a mobile browser is not as good user experience as directly interacting with native mobile app on your android/iOS (or other phone). As I said, I was only experienced in web development. By the time, I didn’t know anything about PWA (Progressive Web App) and as I have later realized, interacting with web app in mobile phone doesn’t need to be such a pain as I thought.

I also have some experience with backend things such as Node.js, Express, Django, PostgreSQL, AWS solutions. On frontend it was mainly React. I immediately started to work on React App, installing all required packages, require routes, redux, apollo. Then on the backend side express, graphql, postgres - also setuped docker for the pg easy access.

A lot of ideas popped in my head. Really great UX, minimalistic design, great customization of charts, notifications, progress tracking, saving money strategy, tags for expenses etc.

Great start!

Too much engineering

You know, my first intention was to easily and efficiently write down my expenses.

New idea

You know, sometimes it’s worth stop for a while and …

Google forms, google sheet

Make “App” with Google Forms and Google Sheet

You go to the Safari / Chrome (on android), tap add on screen, then new icon is added on your screen, and basically you are done. What happened is that you added some kind of link to the webpage, which is link to your google form. The “App” added to your home screen is basically browser cleaned from other functions and now it got only view function. Of course if you want to use the forms you will need the internet connection (You will receive dinosaur page or unable to connect page).

Okay, now you are done and next time you spend some money fill that form in 30 seconds, confirm and that’s it. Your data is saved.

frontmatter.title: Easy and effective way of managing expenses
